verses.text: \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Micheas \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Morasthite, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Joathan, Achaz, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Ezechias, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda: \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H7181"\w* ear, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* therein: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* cleft, \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w wax|strong="H1749"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* run \w down|strong="H5064"\w* \w a|strong="H8478"\w* \w steep|strong="H4174"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w What|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*? \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*? \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda? \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0068"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w as|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w heap|strong="H5856"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w in|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w when|strong="H1540"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* \w is|strong="H7704"\w* \w planted|strong="H4302"\w*: \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w bring|strong="H7760"\w* \w down|strong="H5064"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* thereof \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w* \w bare|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w graven|strong="H6456"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w be|strong="H7725"\w* cut \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w pieces|strong="H3807"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w wages|strong="H0868"\w* shall \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0784"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* destruction \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H0784"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hire|strong="H0868"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hire|strong="H0868"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

Therefore \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* go stripped \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w wailing|strong="H4553"\w* \w like|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dragons, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* \w like|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ostriches|strong="H3284"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0935"\w* \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* \w is|strong="H4347"\w* desperate, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4347"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Juda, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* ye it \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H5046"\w* Geth, \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* ye \w not|strong="H0408"\w* with tears: \w in|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* house \w of|strong="H6083"\w* \w Dust|strong="H6083"\w* sprinkle yourselves with \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, O thou \w that|strong="H4480"\w* dwellest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Beautiful place, covered \w with|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*: \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* confines: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* House adjoining \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* mourning \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, which stood \w by|strong="H3427"\w* herself.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* become weak unto \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H3427"\w* bitterness: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* tumult \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* hath astonished \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Lachis: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Sion, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thee \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w she|strong="H3651"\w* \w send|strong="H5414"\w* messengers \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* inheritance \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Geth: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* lying \w to|strong="H5921"\w* deceive \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w heir|strong="H3423"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w that|strong="H3478"\w* dwellest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Maresa: \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Odollam \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H7139"\w* thee \w bald|strong="H7144"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* polled \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy delicate \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee.
